Description:
GitHub Copilot coding agent, our asynchronous developer agent, now works with Claude Sonnet 4.5, Anthropic’s most advanced model for coding and real-world agents. Claude Sonnet 4.5 is state of the…

The post [Anthropic Claude Sonnet 4.5 is in public preview for Copilot coding agent](https://github.blog/changelog/2025-09-30-anthropic-claude-sonnet-4-5-is-in-public-preview-for-copilot-coding-agent) appeared first on [The GitHub Blog](https://github.blog).
EnhancedContent:
GitHub Copilot coding agent, our asynchronous developer agent, now works with Claude Sonnet 4.5, Anthropic’s most advanced model for coding and real-world agents.

Claude Sonnet 4.5 is state of the art on the SWE-bench Verified evaluation, which measures real-world coding abilities.

If you are a Copilot Pro or Copilot Pro+ user, coding agent will automatically use Claude Sonnet 4.5.

If you are a Copilot Business or Copilot Enterprise user, an administrator will need to [enable the Claude Sonnet 4.5 policy in Copilot settings](https://docs.github.com/copilot/concepts/policies). If this policy is not enabled, coding agent will continue to use Claude Sonnet 4.

To learn more about Copilot coding agent, head to [our documentation on coding agent](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-cloud@latest/copilot/concepts/agents/coding-agent/about-coding-agent).
Author: Allison
Title: Anthropic Claude Sonnet 4.5 is in public preview for Copilot coding agent
